entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shediac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
